title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister for Finance) (No. 2) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister finance) (no 2) order 2021

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 2. Aidan Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Aidan Murphy, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Finance, Government Buildings, Upper Merrion 
Street, Dublin 2, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Finance, on a temporary basis, with effect from 24 August 2021. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

27 October, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [577] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó 
FOILSEACHÁIN RIALTAIS,
